The AudioDevice to register the Block with.

The dispatch queue on which the IOBlock will be dispatched. All IOBlocks are dispatched synchronously. Note that this dispatch queue will be retained until a matching call to AudioDeviceDestroyIOProcID is made. If this value is NULL, then the IOBlock will be directly invoked.

# AudioDeviceCreateIOProcIDWithBlock(_:_:_:_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Core Audio ](/documentation/coreaudio)

- [ AudioDeviceCreateIOProcIDWithBlock(_:_:_:_:) ](/documentation/coreaudio/audiodevicecreateioprocidwithblock(_:_:_:_:))

-  AudioDeviceCreateIOProcIDWithBlock(_:_:_:_:) 

Function# AudioDeviceCreateIOProcIDWithBlock(_:_:_:_:)

iOS 7.0+iPadOS 7.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.7+

```
func AudioDeviceCreateIOProcIDWithBlock(
    _ outIOProcID: UnsafeMutablePointer<AudioDeviceIOProcID?>,
    _ inDevice: AudioObjectID,
    _ inDispatchQueue: dispatch_queue_t?,
    _ inIOBlock: @escaping AudioDeviceIOBlock
) -> OSStatus
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/coreaudio/audiodevicecreateioprocidwithblock(_:_:_:_:)#parameters)

`outIOProcID`The newly created AudioDeviceIOProcID.

`inDevice`The AudioDevice to register the Block with.

`inDispatchQueue`The dispatch queue on which the IOBlock will be dispatched. All IOBlocks are dispatched synchronously. Note that this dispatch queue will be retained until a matching call to AudioDeviceDestroyIOProcID is made. If this value is NULL, then the IOBlock will be directly invoked.

`inIOBlock`The AudioDeviceIOBlock to register. Note that this block will be Block_copyâ€™d and the reference maintained until a matching call to AudioDeviceDestroyIOProcID is made.

## [Return Value](/documentation/coreaudio/audiodevicecreateioprocidwithblock(_:_:_:_:)#return-value)

An OSStatus indicating success or failure.

## [Discussion](/documentation/coreaudio/audiodevicecreateioprocidwithblock(_:_:_:_:)#discussion)

Creates an AudioDeviceIOProcID from an AudioDeviceIOBlock
